name: Hot Hot Cold
description:
Try to get three hot cards in a row to get a hot streak! 

This game was inspired by the language we use to talk about slot machines. We often refer to the machines that seem to be paying out as 'hot' and the ungenerous ones as 'cold'. 

I wanted to create a card game based on the idea of trying to maintain your hot streak. I also wanted to incorporate the idea that players can stop playing a slot machine at any time. In this game, I tried to make it more enticing to keep drawing cards than to 'cash out,' meaning that players would play until they have no money left.
